attributes.action: ensure that the landfill operation at Risley ceases in October 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BIFFA waste is appealing Warrington Borough Council's decision to refuse their proposed extension to the Risley landfill site.  The site has existed for more than 25 years and the Risley Landfill Opposition Group and the people signing this petition seek to oppose any more tipping at Risley - enough is enough.

rejection.details: This is a local authority issue.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
